review_description: excellent, secure and easy to use app. please keep unlimited saves free, watching ads are worth it and there's not too many of them. another app which i was using now only lets you save 5 on free version, only because it is made by a well known and more established cyber security company that's been around for decades on pc. i'm assuming a few other more well known ones will be doing the same but this is just as secure as any of them. love the thumbprint login feature too for quicker access.
developer_response: thank you so much for your detailed feedback and positive review! we're thrilled to hear that you find our app excellent and easy to use. we understand your frustration with other apps limiting free saves, and we're committed to providing a valuable and secure experience without such restrictions. thank you for choosing and supporting our app!

developer_response: hi fyuuredhijgfzre, thank you for your kind words. related to this issue, we believe that the android system is resetting the app. this happens when you have a lot of apps running in the background. the system tries to allocate memory for the active apps and closes the background apps. if the issue persist please contact support. best regards

developer_response: hello, you need to add your accounts manually(websites/apps). when you add an account you can set different filters for it. you also have the possibility to add your own filters by going to the settings section. if you still encounter difficulties please contact support@managerpass.com and we will be very happy to help you. regards, apphup team
